structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.text: Each city shall constitute a corporation, with capacity to sue and be sued, to contract and be contracted with, to acquire and dispose of property, and to have a common seal and change it at pleasure or act without a seal.
law.history: Created 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 239, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1980.
